metadata.dc:author: Gómez Parada, J
Puyol Pallas, M
metadata.dc:description: Nineteen patients seen for AUR secondary to benign prostate hypertrophy and with high surgical risk, were treated with an LH-RH agonist (GOSERELIN). After six months of treatment a 43.28% decrease in the prostate volume was seen, Improvement, i.e., spontaneous miction, was achieved in 46.6% patients, although post-mictional volumes remained high.
metadata.dc:title: Tratamiento de la retención aguda de orina debida a hipertrofia benigna de próstata con un agonista LH-RH (Goserelina).
[Treatment of acute urine retention caused by benign prostatic hypertrophy with an LH-RH agonist (Goserelin)].
